hello everybody well I will try to keep you all awake I want to talk a little

was the same kind of thing it was the computer system that was deciding what was happening and there were a few

a bin was full it would try to put something in and push and push and push
and if the motor tripped ah the bin is full which doesn't work very well if
you've got something very heavy on the pallet and something very light in the bin the radical innovation in this in

there there were some things that's starting to be done differently one example of this there was a company that

they used another learning technology where it was much easier to discern what

determine the the risk of somebody reoffending to decide whether or not to
